definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: usurping king of Israel, Fakee (opening (? of eyes), or cf. Syr. peqh.o0 flower; cf. n.pr.m. [[פקח]], ´[[פקח]], on old Isr. seals; in As. Paḳaḫa (acc.) Schr:COT 2k 15, 30);—2Ki 15:25, 2Ki 15:27, 2Ki 15:29, 2Ki 15:30, 2Ki 15:31, 2Ki 15:32, 2Ki 15:37, 2Ki 16:1, 2Ki 16:5, Is 7:1, 2Ch 28:6.
